pages.text: The $(mob)Dullahan$() is a monster that spawns on the surface in Extreme Hills in the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. She is vulnerable to gold equipment, weapons, and tools. $(mob)Dullahan$() attack players on sight with melee attacks that apply a $(thing)Slowness$() effect.
$(mob)Dullahan$() drops $(item)Soul Fire$() on death. These are an excellent source of fuel and burn for 580 seconds. They can also be used like $(item)Flint and Steel$() to start fires.

$(mob)Dullahan$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
